name: jekd
description: Dependency injection library that makes it possible to unit-test application easily by giving ability to change injected objects easily at the testing time

scripts.semantic-release: if [ "$TRAVIS_BRANCH" == "master" ]; then semantic-release pre && npm publish && semantic-release post; fi

author: Alexey Galkin <aagalkin@gmail.com> (https://github.com/glkn)
